title: Giro Redux: How Chris Froome and Team Sky blew up the Giro d’Italia in One Wild Attack
content:
As the 2024 Giro d'Italia clicks into gear, we take a look back at one of the modern Giro's most remarkable and controversial stages with Froome's 80km breakaway to seize the pink jersey in 2018.

Read the full article at Giro Redux: How Chris Froome and Team Sky blew up the Giro d’Italia in One Wild Attack on Velo.
